mapper.update: update t_inventory set way=way+#{quantity} where wid=#{inWid} and gid=#{gid}
update t_inventory set allowance=allowance-#{quantity} where wid=#{outWid} and gid=#{gid}
update t_inventory set allowance=allowance+#{quantity},way=way-#{quantity} where wid=#{inWid} and gid=#{gid}
update t_access set status=1 where id=#{id}
update t_access set status=2 where flag=(select flag from t_access where direction='IN' and id=#{id}) and direction='OUT'
update t_access set status=3 where id=#{id}
update t_access set status=3 where flag=(select flag from t_access where direction='OUT' and id=#{id}) and direction='IN'
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_access where wid=#{inWid}
select count(*) from t_access where wid=#{outWid}

select ta.id,ta.wid,ta.quantity,ta.gid,ta.status,tw.name whName,tg.name goodsName from t_access ta left join t_warehouse tw on ta.wid=tw.id left join t_goods tg on ta.gid=tg.id where ta.direction='IN' order by ta.id desc limit #{start},#{size}

select ta.id,ta.wid,ta.quantity,ta.gid,ta.status,tw.name whName,tg.name goodsName from t_access ta left join t_warehouse tw on ta.wid=tw.id left join t_goods tg on ta.gid=tg.id where ta.direction='OUT' order by ta.id desc limit #{start},#{size}
